00023 template <class GraphicsItemClass, class ObjectClass>
00024 class TObjectShapeBase: 
00025                      public TShapeBase<GraphicsItemClass>,
00026                      public imod::TSingleModelObserverBase<ObjectClass>
00027 {
00028 public:
00029        typedef TShapeBase<GraphicsItemClass> BaseClass;
00030        typedef imod::TSingleModelObserverBase<ObjectClass> BaseClass2;
00031 
00032        TObjectShapeBase(bool isEditable = false, const ISceneProvider* providerPtr = NULL);
00033 
00034 protected:
00035        // reimplemented (TShapeBase)
00036        virtual void OnSelectionChanged(bool isSelected);
00037        virtual void OnPositionChanged(const QPointF& position);
00038 
00039        // reimplemented (QGraphicsItem) 
00040        virtual QVariant itemChange(QGraphicsItem::GraphicsItemChange change, const QVariant& value);
00041        virtual void mousePressEvent(QGraphicsSceneMouseEvent* eventPtr);
00042        virtual void mouseReleaseEvent(QGraphicsSceneMouseEvent* eventPtr);
00043        virtual void mouseDoubleClickEvent(QGraphicsSceneMouseEvent* eventPtr);
00044 
00045        // reimplemented (imod::IObserver)
00046        virtual void AfterUpdate(imod::IModel* modelPtr, int updateFlags, istd::IPolymorphic* updateParamsPtr);
00047 
00048        // abstract methods
00049        virtual void UpdateGraphicsItem(const ObjectClass& object) = 0;
00050 
00051 private:
00052        QPointF m_lastPosition;
00053        bool m_isObjectMoved;
00054 
00055        bool m_isShapeUpdateBlocked;
00056 
00057        istd::CChangeNotifier m_mousePressingNotifier;

00063 template <class GraphicsItemClass, class ObjectClass>
00064 TObjectShapeBase<GraphicsItemClass, ObjectClass>::TObjectShapeBase(bool isEditable, const ISceneProvider* providerPtr)
00065 :      BaseClass(isEditable, providerPtr),
00066        m_isShapeUpdateBlocked(false),
00067        m_mousePressingNotifier(NULL, i2d::IObject2d::CF_OBJECT_POSITION | istd::IChangeable::CF_MODEL)
00068 {
00069        BaseClass::SetPen(BaseClass::InactiveColor, QPen(Qt::darkGreen, 0));
00070        BaseClass::SetPen(BaseClass::EditableColor, QPen(Qt::green, 0));
00071        BaseClass::SetPen(BaseClass::SelectedColor, QPen(Qt::yellow, 0));
00072 
00073        if (isEditable){
00074               BaseClass::setFlags(BaseClass::ItemIsMovable | BaseClass::ItemIsSelectable | BaseClass::ItemSendsGeometryChanges);
00075               BaseClass::setCursor(QCursor(Qt::ArrowCursor)); 
00076 
00077               BaseClass::SwitchColorSheme(BaseClass::EditableColor);
00078        }
00079        else{
00080               BaseClass::SwitchColorSheme(BaseClass::InactiveColor);
00081        }
00082 }

00089 template <class GraphicsItemClass, class ObjectClass>
00090 void TObjectShapeBase<GraphicsItemClass, ObjectClass>::OnSelectionChanged(bool isSelected)
00091 {
00092        if (isSelected){
00093               BaseClass::SwitchColorSheme(BaseClass::SelectedColor);
00094        }
00095        else{
00096               if (BaseClass::IsEditable()){
00097                      BaseClass::SwitchColorSheme(BaseClass::EditableColor);
00098               }
00099               else{
00100                      BaseClass::SwitchColorSheme(BaseClass::InactiveColor);         
00101               }
00102        }
00103 }
00104 
00105 
00106 template <class GraphicsItemClass, class ObjectClass>
00107 void TObjectShapeBase<GraphicsItemClass, ObjectClass>::OnPositionChanged(const QPointF& position)
00108 {
00109        i2d::IObject2d* objectPtr = BaseClass2::GetObjectPtr();
00110        if (objectPtr != NULL){
00111               QPointF offset = position - m_lastPosition;
00112 
00113               objectPtr->MoveCenterTo(iqt::GetCVector2d(offset) + objectPtr->GetCenter());
00114 
00115               m_lastPosition = position;
00116               m_isObjectMoved = true;
00117        }
00118 
00119        BaseClass::OnPositionChanged(position);
00120 }
00121 
00122 
00123 template <class GraphicsItemClass, class ObjectClass>
00124 QVariant TObjectShapeBase<GraphicsItemClass, ObjectClass>::itemChange(QGraphicsItem::GraphicsItemChange change, const QVariant& value)
00125 {
00126        if (!m_isShapeUpdateBlocked){
00127               return BaseClass::itemChange(change, value);
00128        }
00129 
00130        return value;
00131 }

00133 
00134 template <class GraphicsItemClass, class ObjectClass>
00135 void TObjectShapeBase<GraphicsItemClass, ObjectClass>::mousePressEvent(QGraphicsSceneMouseEvent* eventPtr)
00136 {
00137        BaseClass::mousePressEvent(eventPtr);
00138 
00139        if (BaseClass::IsEditable() && (eventPtr->button() == Qt::LeftButton)){
00140               m_lastPosition = BaseClass::pos();
00141               m_isObjectMoved = false;
00142 
00143               m_mousePressingNotifier.SetPtr(BaseClass2::GetObjectPtr());
00144        }
00145 }
00146 
00147 
00148 template <class GraphicsItemClass, class ObjectClass>
00149 void TObjectShapeBase<GraphicsItemClass, ObjectClass>::mouseReleaseEvent(QGraphicsSceneMouseEvent* eventPtr)
00150 {
00151        BaseClass::mouseReleaseEvent(eventPtr);
00152 
00153        if (m_isObjectMoved){
00154               m_mousePressingNotifier.Reset();
00155        }
00156        else{
00157               m_mousePressingNotifier.Abort();
00158        }
00159 }
00160 
00161 
00162 template <class GraphicsItemClass, class ObjectClass>
00163 void TObjectShapeBase<GraphicsItemClass, ObjectClass>::mouseDoubleClickEvent(QGraphicsSceneMouseEvent* eventPtr)
00164 {
00165        BaseClass::mouseDoubleClickEvent(eventPtr);
00166 
00167        m_mousePressingNotifier.Reset();
00168 }

00171 // reimplemented (imod::IObserver)

00173 template <class GraphicsItemClass, class ObjectClass>
00174 void TObjectShapeBase<GraphicsItemClass, ObjectClass>::AfterUpdate(imod::IModel* /*modelPtr*/, int /*updateFlags*/, istd::IPolymorphic* /*updateParamsPtr*/)
00175 {
00176        I_ASSERT(!m_isShapeUpdateBlocked);
00177 
00178        ObjectClass* objectPtr = BaseClass2::GetObjectPtr();
00179        if (objectPtr != NULL){
00180               m_isShapeUpdateBlocked = true;
00181 
00182               UpdateGraphicsItem(*objectPtr);
00183 
00184               m_isShapeUpdateBlocked = false;
00185 
00186               BaseClass::update();
00187        }
00188 }
